context: Growth period in the network storage market. NetApp was expanding its unified storage approach with ONTAP operating system, competing against established enterprise storage giants. The NAS and SAN markets were both growing rapidly as enterprises increased data storage needs.

competitors.name: EMC Corporation
competitors.notes: Market leader in enterprise storage with Symmetrix and Celerra products

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Major enterprise storage provider with diverse storage portfolio

competitors.name: Hewlett-Packard
competitors.notes: Significant player with HP StorageWorks and enterprise arrays

competitors.name: Sun Microsystems
competitors.notes: Storage systems and file servers, before Oracle acquisition

competitors.name: Western Digital
competitors.notes: Storage solutions and hard drive manufacturer entering enterprise space
